channel.title: Corrupted Mov file?
channel.description:
[s]Hello. I recently tried to record with my action cam. It's a camone infinity if that matters. I recorded until the battery shut down. And when it did the file didn't completely saved. So now i got a 1,75GB corrupted mov file.
Any idea on how to make it viewable again.
I downloaded a software (http://www.grauonline.de/cmsimple2_6/en/) Who is called videorepair.
The trial do half the video. And that is enough proof to show me that the file is not completelt lost.
So... I am looking for a way to retrieve my file from the lost space and make it viewable at no cost.
If anyone knows anything or could helpt me out, I would have been so grateful :)
Greetings: Kneistol[/s]
EDIT: Downloaded cracked version and fixed the full file :) Lock?
